sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { projects } from "../App"; const ProjectsGrid = () => { return (
{projects.map((project) => (
{project.title}

{project.category}

{/* ✅ Bootstrap Modal for each project */}
{project.title}

{project.description}

Technologies:{" "} {project.technologies.join(", ")}

Live Demo GitHub
{/* ✅ End Modal */}
))}
); }; export default ProjectsGrid;
